page.title: 02Local Features (2), Bowness.
page.content:
The{Promenade}was built in 1912 and is overlooked by the Belsfield Hotel. In{Queen's Square}two trees were planted at the turn of the century, called Martha and Mary,however only one survives. { {St Martin's}Church was built in the 15th Cent.{Laurel Cottage(1613)}was the first school in Bowness. This was eventually succeeded by the building just behind in 1867 which in turn was closed in 1975 when the new{Goodly {Dale County Primary School}was opened. This in its turn has been threatened with closure recently.
More recently a new shopping precinct has been developed on Lake Rd,called the{Quarry Rigg Precinct.
